solution.text:
Total no. of outcomes on rolling a pair of dice \(=36\)
No. of outcomes such that the number on one die is a multiple of \(2\), and a multiple of \(3\) on the other \(=11\)
Sample space :\([(2,3), (3,2), (2,6), (6,2) (3,4), (4,3), (3,6), (6,3), (4,6), (6,4), (6,6)]\)
Probability \(=\frac{11}{36}\)

content.text: A multiple of \(2\) on one die and a multiple of \(3\) on the other?
